description: A pair of tiny metal fingerstops, adjustable in position and length.  Allow for better handling of the firearm.  These don't offer a major improvement due to their miniature size, but are better than nothing.

name.str_pl: pairs of Strike Industries Bikini fingerstops

variants.description: A pair of tiny metal fingerstops, essentially the most minimal version of a foregrip.  The fingerstops can be positioned in any way, in order to fit the grip of any shooter.  Their effect is negligible, in exchange for lower footprint and minuscule added weight.  <variant:black/plural>

//weight: the EU store for Strike Industries confirms that the listed weight is for one piece, while this is a pair

notes: just like with weight, we assume that the dimensions are given for a single piece, while this item is a pair
thus, we double the resulting volume

description: A compact metal handstop.  Allows for better handling of the firearm.  Textured, thus offering slightly better performance over its competitors of similar size.

variants.description: A tiny metal handstop with a barrier-style texture.  Its effect is negligible, in exchange for lower footprint and minuscule added weight.  <variant:black>
